revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=RP614 |revision=v3 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=10/2004 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Micrel |cpu1_model=KS8695X;KS8695X, 0439B0, AMK4211130, 1568377; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BBTC-90 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |jtag=yes,, looks like it,, J5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J2,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Nucleus RTOS; |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=00:0F:B5 }} {{TagLine|Cable/DSL Web Safe Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=RP614v3}} "2976233202" and a date code of ''0446'' is silkscreened on the board. :The caps on this board are all ''TAICON'' branded. A version string within ''Netgear'''s binary FW for this device :(which is valid for the RP614v2 as well..) :indicates this device is using the '''Nucleus PLUS''' kernel. The version string is '''~ (c) 1993-2002 AT - Nucleus PLUS - IDT32334 SDE-MIPS v. 1.13.2'''. ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== The pinout would appear to be the following.. 
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3] J2
====Boot log==== 
@_@! Post Code Start.....
SW_REV_2d02d00KKDebug(Menu): Normal check ok!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
KKDebug(ISR_IrqHandler): Interrupt is 20000!!!
==Probable used PSU(s)== The power supply bundled with the device looks to have :been an ''OEM'' AD-051A - ''Netgear'' P/N PWR-10028-01. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=OEM |model=AD-051A |revision=(Netgear PWR-10028-01) |manuf_country=China |input_v=120 |input_a=0.11 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=1 |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical }}
